channel.title: Projects on Haoyu Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Haoyu Zhang

item.title: TOP
item.description: TOP package implemented a two-stage polytomous regression framework to handle cancer data with multivariate tumor characteristics

item.title: PAGEANT
item.description: The application allows rapid power and sample size analysis for a variety of genetic association tests by specification of a few key parameters.

item.title: CKLRT
item.description: Composite Kernel Machine Regression based on Likelihood Ratio Test (CKLRT) implemented a kernel machine regression framework to model the overall genetic effect of a SNP-set, considering the possible GE interaction
